name: Beat mr sax with only 12 punches and without getting hit
Clip 5 times in Mr Sax's Hullaballoo without pressing down
Reach the top SMC1 end sign without touching any sharpeners
Beat moskito’s nest with 1 punch
Fully game over
Enter Anguish Lagoon for the first time with 13 lives and 5 cages
Hit Mr. Stone 6 times while having atleast 3 dogs alive all the time.
Beat first screen of mr. sax as small rayman
Beat Bongo hills without dying and without taking damage while getting all cages
Beat Space Mama while having exactly 19 cages
Take the skops photographer, then get all cages in reverse order without leaving the screen
Beat the PPW2 Magician under 8 seconds.
Beat Pencil Pentathlon without running nor helicoptering in screens 1 and 3
Get all TSoF cages in reverse order
Softlock the game
in TSoF final screen, go from bottom to top without taking damage and without using helicopter
Grimace 69 times
Do a superjump
Beat the final screen of PP without walking off of slippery platforms
Zip 4 times
Kill 10 tall living stones without using punch
Beat SMC1 while only being able to touch 1 pink eraser
Beat viking mama while having exactly 12 lives
Beat the BH4 Magician under 23 seconds without using run and helicopter
Kill 50 living stones (small or tall) in 1 screen without getting hit
